notes: [Fixed] Correctly use best logging method based on Craft version
[Fixed] Restore ability to clear caches from the CP
[Added] Support for Craft 2.5 features, incl. plugin icon & release feed
[Fixed] Allowed for protocol-less URLs when CURLing to remote assets
[Fixed] match link & script tags if they span across multiple lines
[Improved] Introduced getSchemaVersion() so that future updates will not require your site to go down just to finish updating.
